title: Remove certifications gallery

requirements.text: Remove the CertificationsGallery component import and render from the main App.tsx component
acceptanceCriteria: The import statement for CertificationsGallery is removed from frontend/src/App.tsx
The <CertificationsGallery /> component render call is removed from the JSX
The application compiles without errors after the removal

requirements.text: Delete the CertificationsGallery.tsx component file from frontend/src/components/
acceptanceCriteria: No references to CertificationsGallery remain in the codebase

requirements.text: Delete the CertificateModal.tsx component file from frontend/src/components/
acceptanceCriteria: No references to CertificateModal remain in the codebase

constraints: Do not modify any other sections or components of the portfolio
Maintain the existing layout flow from Interests section to Footer
nonGoals: Deleting certification image files from frontend/public/assets/
Adding replacement content for the removed gallery
